channel.title: ArrayList adding

item.title: ArrayList adding
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

I’m trying to make a wave-type minigame and I need to add spawned NPC’s into an array list.

public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY) { server.npcHandler.npcSpawn(npcID, absX, absY, 0); npcs.add(???); }

How would I go about making it so I can add the spawned NPC’s into the array list? I have tried a lot of things and kept getting errors.

Read full topic
